pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, December 1, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

London, Ontario

Private meetings

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement on delivering dental care for children under 12 and hold a media availability. The Minister of Families, Children and Social Development, Karina Gould, will be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
